item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night:

A LADIES night club in the North Shore. (10 min from Boston).

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

Great DJ that will be mixing their R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

If you attend Maddy's Lounge 1st than you will get a discount at The Hide Away.

Any questions e-mail: Hideaway0101@yahoo.com


• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• (Food)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: The Hide Away
